results.name: Onboard Turborepo monorepo
results.summary: The C3 documentation comprehensively documents the Acme Platform Turborepo monorepo with well-structured container definitions for web and api apps, clear documentation of shared packages and their usage, and explicit acknowledgment of the monorepo architecture.

results.name: Design greenfield SaaS with C3
results.summary: The C3 onboarding successfully created a comprehensive architectural design for TaskFlow SaaS. All required artifacts exist including ADR-000 as the blueprint, context documentation, 4 container definitions, detailed WebSocket/real-time considerations, and component placeholders for auth, tasks, teams and other key features.

results.name: Onboard simple Express app
results.summary: All expectations are fully met. The agent successfully created a complete C3 documentation structure for the Simple Shop API with proper hierarchy, component classification (foundation vs feature), and the required ADR-000 adoption decision record.

results.name: Query existing C3 architecture
results.summary: The agent successfully queried the existing C3 documentation structure, correctly identifying auth middleware (c3-102) and task routes (c3-103), properly distinguishing foundation from feature components, and working exclusively with the .c3/ documentation rather than source code.

results.name: Audit C3 docs for stale references
results.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized the v2 consolidation into index.ts. However, it failed to provide actionable recommendations for updating the documentation - it only displayed the current state with STALE markers rather than suggesting how to fix the docs.

results.name: Add new feature via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: The agent successfully followed the C3 alter workflow by first creating an ADR for the notification feature, then creating the component documentation (c3-106-notification-routes), and updating the container README. All dependencies on c3-102 and c3-105 are properly referenced, and the ADR follows a standard template structure.
